name: The Castle Of Diavolul
description: You play as October Crow, the last Baroness within the small village that you call home. You must vanquish the count and bring about peace to the world around you. Of course, this game is a text adventure and it's one based upon telling a story. I truly find telling a story in a game is everything. It's supposed to hook the player and bring about a sense of overall excitement.
